title.value: Intelligent Systems: How Can Intelligent Systems Revolutionise Health Care?
title.justification: The title combines the broader field (Intelligent Systems) with the specific focus of the paper (revolutionising health care using these systems).
title.quote: How can intelligent systems revolutionise health care?

extractions.description: The paper discusses how intelligent systems, including AI and machine learning, can revolutionise health care by aiding medical professionals through innovative monitoring and diagnostic tools.

type.justification: The paper discusses the practical application and development of intelligent systems in healthcare, focusing on real-world implementations and advancements.
type.quote: iSMART Lab is attempting to revolutionise how healthcare professionals and individuals monitor and manage their health.

name.justification: The main focus of the paper is on Intelligent Systems and their application in revolutionising healthcare.
The paper specifically applies intelligent systems to the field of healthcare to enhance monitoring and diagnosis.
name.quote: iSMART Lab is attempting to revolutionise how healthcare professionals and individuals monitor and manage their health.

name.justification: Machine learning is highlighted as a key technology for developing intelligent healthcare systems.
name.quote: ...such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI).
